CustomField.description:
26/10/2016 - Garth James (Salesforce) - Created. This field stores the Username for the account owner for newly created accounts during JIT provisioning for suppliers. Said another way, when the SupplierJITProvisioner class runs to create a new account, it will use this value to find the account owner.
To be clear: this is meant to be that user's NICKNAME (as opposed to Username or Email address). This is because the Nickname is unique.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When the SupplierJITProvisioner class runs to create a new account, it will use this value to find the account owner. To be clear: this is meant to be that user's NICKNAME (as opposed to Username or Email address). This is because the Nickname is unique.
CustomField.label: Account Owner Nickname
